Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4

Class CoffeeViewController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.CoffeeViewController
public class CoffeeViewController extends Object
This class controls the coffee view window and determines what happens when certain actions are made
Author:
Rory Xu, Hassan Alfareed
